channel.title: BoboPvP - Dicing, PvP [Eco] Korasi![Webclient][Loading 634][TwoWorlds]
channel.description:
[center]BoboPvP is Back! AND WE'VE GOTTEN BETTER Webclient, Forums, Dl Client
Start Here - http://www.bobopvp.com/ [Webclient Connects Both Worlds] _______________________________________
[size=20pt]Do You Want An Economy?[/size]
webclient- [url=http://www.Bobopvp.com/]www.Bobopvp.com/[/url] dlc- [url=http://goo.gl/aDAFM]http://goo.gl/aDAFM[/url]
Working Staking! [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/staking.png[/img]
Custom Bosses
[IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/DeepWildPvPBoss.png[/img]
Plane Freezer
[IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/lak.png[/img]
Kree
[IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Bosses.png[/img] __________________________________________
[size=20pt]Or DO You Want A Pk Eco![/size]
[b]In the PvP economy world players teleports and pvm has been removed. You just gear up and pk for PvP and Pk level earned level points along with the PvP Titles![/b]
[IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Titles.png[/img]
Also click combat stats to increase them
[IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/ClicktoLevel.png[/img]
Webclient - [url=http://www.Bobopvp.com/Pk]www.Bobopvp.com/Pk[/url]
Download Client - [url=http://goo.gl/aDAFM]http://goo.gl/aDAFM[/url]
____________________________________________
RsWebclients Link(Not Recommended) - http://www.rswebclients.com/info/BoboPvP
Features: -Perfect Switching for Hybrids -Veng -Barrage -634 Graphics/Animations/Items -PvP Armor/Curses released -New F-Keys -Unique features -Stable Economy -No dupes -24/7 vps hosted -Constant Updates -Great Staff Team -634 graphics -Great Donator Benefits -Chaotic Weapons -Great Rushing System! -Full Drops AND RANDOM PvP Drops too! -Pking Level! -Clue Scrolls and great rewards! -Turmoil/Soul Split, with proper effects -Highscores System Interfaces! -100% drop party room -Spirit shields with proper effects, i.e: -Divine: Always reduces 30% of damage, taking 5% of the 30% from your -Prayer. -Elysian: 70% chance of reducing 25% damage taken. -Perfect xlogging fix -Duel arena -Godwars bosses -Webclient -Unique donor system -Slayer points -Perfect revamped banking -Revamped PvP System -Perfect, revamped shopping -Perfect private messaging -All private chat options work properly -Pest control -Slayer points -All skillcape emotes work -Perfect combat -Amazing pking -Buy 50, sell 50 -No rollbacks -Pest control -Donator crown changing system -All skills are trainable -Pk points and pk point store. -All PvP Items and Armors. (Morrigans, Vesta, Statius, and Zuriels) -Overloads -Restore Special -Primal armour + weapons -Promethium Armor + weapons -Korasi's Sword -Hand cannon -Chaotic Shield -Dragon Defender
[size=10pt]Custom Bank Boss[/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/CustomBankBoss.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Pking Level![/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Levels.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Players waiting to make you sit![/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Players.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Teleport interfaces[Eco world][/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Problemtobefixed-1.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Donator Zone[Donations accepted one week monthly][/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/DonorZone.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Commands![/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/JoinToday.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Come Pk!- Picture of server last year formerly known as SolitudePkz[/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/sf-1.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: BoboPvP - Dicing, PvP [Eco] Korasi![Webclient][Loading 634][TwoWorlds]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You are only allowed one advertisement per server, you have over 10. I have locked all of the previous threads except for this one (your first thread). If you continue to breach the rules your posting rights will be revoked in this board. Good luck!

Read full topic

item.description:
@djzone wrote:

[center]BoboPvP is Back!
AND WE’VE GOTTEN BETTER
Webclient, Forums, Dl Client

Start Here - http://www.bobopvp.com/ [Webclient Connects Both Worlds]

[size=20pt]Do You Want An Economy?[/size]

webclient- www.Bobopvp.com/
dlc- http://goo.gl/aDAFM

Working Staking!

Custom Bosses

Plane Freezer

Kree

[size=20pt]Or DO You Want A Pk Eco![/size]

In the PvP economy world players teleports and pvm has been removed. You just gear up and pk for PvP and Pk level earned level points
along with the PvP Titles!

Also click combat stats to increase them

Webclient - www.Bobopvp.com/Pk

Download Client - http://goo.gl/aDAFM

RsWebclients Link(Not Recommended) - http://www.rswebclients.com/info/BoboPvP

Features:
-Perfect Switching for Hybrids
-Veng
-Barrage
-634 Graphics/Animations/Items
-PvP Armor/Curses released
-New F-Keys
-Unique features
-Stable Economy
-No dupes
-24/7 vps hosted
-Constant Updates
-Great Staff Team
-634 graphics
-Great Donator Benefits
-Chaotic Weapons
-Great Rushing System!
-Full Drops AND RANDOM PvP Drops too!
-Pking Level!
-Clue Scrolls and great rewards!
-Turmoil/Soul Split, with proper effects
-Highscores System Interfaces!
-100% drop party room
-Spirit shields with proper effects, i.e:
-Divine: Always reduces 30% of damage, taking 5% of the 30% from your -Prayer. -Elysian: 70% chance of reducing 25% damage taken.
-Perfect xlogging fix
-Duel arena
-Godwars bosses
-Webclient
-Unique donor system
-Slayer points
-Perfect revamped banking
-Revamped PvP System
-Perfect, revamped shopping
-Perfect private messaging
-All private chat options work properly
-Pest control
-Slayer points
-All skillcape emotes work
-Perfect combat
-Amazing pking
-Buy 50, sell 50
-No rollbacks
-Pest control
-Donator crown changing system
-All skills are trainable
-Pk points and pk point store.
-All PvP Items and Armors.
(Morrigans, Vesta, Statius, and Zuriels)
-Overloads
-Restore Special
-Primal armour + weapons
-Promethium Armor + weapons
-Korasi’s Sword
-Hand cannon
-Chaotic Shield
-Dragon Defender
